title: Three Options of Being

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Are you a process? A vessel? A witness?
dialogue.context: The AI presents three different models for understanding consciousness

scene_context: A 3-panel scene showing a jury (judges), a machine (process), and a vessel (container), as the Architect poses three fundamental options for what consciousness might be.
philosophical_theme: The basic categories for understanding the nature of self
visual_elements: Three panels: jury representing witness/judge, machine representing process, vessel representing container
